name: Goku Shooting Day
description:
It's May 9th and it's time to settle things between Vegeta and Goku!

  • Try to defeat the famous Saiyan in this simple Light Gun Shooter like!
  • Set your Battle Parameters to challenge yourself
  • Reducing the Timer multiplies the points you earn ! Try your best to be OVER 9000 !!

Art Direction based on Dragon Ball Z Supersonic Warriors (GBA).

SFX extract from DBZ animation & Nes game series.

BGM from Ultimate Battle 22 OST

*Mobile Browsers may not display the full content (You may have to scroll). The game is playable though!

*Android version available on download!
